Title: Relates to the prohibition of the sale of infant inclined sleepers and the restriction of the use of such inclined sleepers in certain settings
Summary: Prohibits the sale of infant inclined sleepers; restricts the use of such inclined sleepers in certain settings.
LawCode: Add ยง399-iii, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the prohibition of the sale of infant inclined sleepers and the restriction of the use of such sleepers in certain settings
